hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Check if the database root user has been set if [ -z "$database_admin_user_secret_name" ]; then echo "The 'database_admin_user_secret_name' must be set in the global configuration" exit 1 fi
# Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
assume_role
# Getting db admin user secret value by secret name db_admin_user_json=$(fetch_secret "$database_admin_user_secret_name")
# DB admin user information db_admin_user_username=$(extract_field "$db_admin_user_json" "username") db_admin_user_password=$(extract_field "$db_admin_user_json" "password") db_admin_user_host=$database_host_address
# Check if any of the variables are empty if [ -z "$db_admin_user_username" ] || [ -z "$db_admin_user_password" ] || [ -z "$db_admin_user_host" ]; then echo "Error: One or more required database variables are empty." >&2 exit 1 fi
initialize_shared_db_config "${db_admin_user_host%:3306}" "$db_admin_user_username" "$db_admin_user_password" if [ "$DROP_AUTH_TABLES" = true ]; then drop_all_tables "auth" fi
if [ "$DROP_PICSURE_TABLES" = true ]; then drop_all_tables "picsure" fi
unset_shared_db_config reset_role
